item.title: Connecting the Sustainable Mindset for Humanity
item.description:
Connecting the Sustainable Mindset for Humanity

The earth belongs to no one. It is an environment to be respected and enjoyed by all life.

item.title: B Corps in the UK
item.description:
B Corps in the UK

B Lab UK, the charity coordinating B Corp activity in the UK (B Lab UK has been incorporated as a not for profit company limited by guarantee and has applied to the Charity Commission for registration as a charity), will be officially launching in September 2015.

item.title: Sustainable Apparel Coalition
item.description:
Sustainable Apparel Coalition

Patagonia helped gather the top leaders in the apparel industry, non-governmental organizations, academia and the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency for an inaugural meeting in 2010 to determine the feasibility of working together to create an index of social and environmental performance.

item.title: What's Your Biggest Regret?
item.description:
What's Your Biggest Regret?

A blackboard stood in the middle of New York City asking passersby to write down their biggest regrets. As the board filled up, we noticed that all of these responses had one alarming thing in common. on Thu, Jan 28 2016 Â· 3,148 Views
